original_text: When he learned that Jesus was under Herod’s jurisdiction, he sent him to Herod, who was also in Jerusalem at that time.
korean_text: 헤롯의 관할에 속한 줄을 알고 헤롯에게 보내니 그 때에 헤롯이 예루살렘에 있더라

sentences.original_text: When he learned that Jesus was under Herod's jurisdiction
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 예수가 헤롯의 관할하에 있다는 것을 알았을 때

sentences.original_text: who was also in Jerusalem at that time
